component.name: Bubble Chains
component.summary: Arcade and puzzle 2D game where you have to remove all the target pieces by seeking for chains of bubbles of the same color

description.p: The aim of the game is to remove all the target pieces by seeking for chains of bubbles of the same color on each level, and to do this before the time runs out. Keep doing this until you have beaten the last level and won the game.
